TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
We can leave the Sorcerer with the guardsmen here at Gallia and head north.
We can leave the Sorcerer with the guardsmen here at Gallia and head north.
We can leave the Sorcerer with the guardsmen here at Gallia and head north.
We can leave the Sorcerer with the guardsmen here at Gallia and head north.
No.
No.
No.
No.
No? Why not?
No? Why not?
No? Why not?
No? Why not?
He needs to be taken to the Riverguard in Maethelburg. Something is changing, not just north of the mountains, but here as well. It is like a storm... a huge storm. I can tell that you feel it, too.
He needs to be taken to the Riverguard in Maethelburg. Something is changing, not just north of the mountains, but here as well. It is like a storm... a huge storm. I can tell that you feel it, too.
He needs to be taken to the Riverguard in Maethelburg. Something is changing, not just north of the mountains, but here as well. It is like a storm... a huge storm. I can tell that you feel it, too.
He needs to be taken to the Riverguard in Maethelburg. Something is changing, not just north of the mountains, but here as well. It is like a storm... a huge storm. I can tell that you feel it, too.
I have fought three of these Sorcerers in the past month. The Riverguard protect much of the Borderlands, and they will have questions for him. Questions he WILL answer... eventually.
I have fought three of these Sorcerers in the past month. The Riverguard protect much of the Borderlands, and they will have questions for him. Questions he WILL answer... eventually.
I have fought three of these Sorcerers in the past month. The Riverguard protect much of the Borderlands, and they will have questions for him. Questions he WILL answer... eventually.
I have fought three of these Sorcerers in the past month. The Riverguard protect much of the Borderlands, and they will have questions for him. Questions he WILL answer... eventually.
Then we take him to the Riverguard. But I want your word that once we've done so, you will come north with me.
Then we take him to the Riverguard. But I want your word that once we've done so, you will come north with me.
Then we take him to the Riverguard. But I want your word that once we've done so, you will come north with me.
Then we take him to the Riverguard. But I want your word that once we've done so, you will come north with me.
WE will not take him. YOU will.
WE will not take him. YOU will.
WE will not take him. YOU will.
WE will not take him. YOU will.
Me? Why me? You captured him.
Me? Why me? You captured him.
Me? Why me? You captured him.
Me? Why me? You captured him.
I... am not permitted near Maethelburg. You must go in my stead.
I... am not permitted near Maethelburg. You must go in my stead.
I... am not permitted near Maethelburg. You must go in my stead.
I... am not permitted near Maethelburg. You must go in my stead.
But why? What have you done that could be so bad? You're trying to help these people!
But why? What have you done that could be so bad? You're trying to help these people!
But why? What have you done that could be so bad? You're trying to help these people!
But why? What have you done that could be so bad? You're trying to help these people!
My past is not important. What IS important is that you take the sorcerer to the Red Tower. When you return, I give you my word that we will head north.
My past is not important. What IS important is that you take the sorcerer to the Red Tower. When you return, I give you my word that we will head north.
